prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with icy blue fur and majestic tusks.
Show me a large aquatic creature that resembles a walrus and has snow-like features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in icy waters, with an impressive ice attack ability.
Generate an adorable evolution of a walrus Pokemon that enjoys playing in the snow.
Design a fierce Pokemon that uses its blubber for protection against icy environments.
Make a Pokemon that exhibits both grace and strength while swimming in cold oceans.
Give me a creative take on a sea-dwelling Pokemon with a playful disposition.
